Esta bastante interesante, es entretenido y podes viciar mucho tiempo, los asesinos son atractivos y los mapas tienen buena ambientacion, eso es lo bueno, ahora viene lo malo, tiene muchos bugs, es dificil encontrar una partida sin lag, las animaciones de mori son un asco, muchas veces se descuadran y terminas matando a la nada misma y las animaciones son super cuadradas, no se si el hitbox va por probabilidades pero de lugares donde no alcanzaba magicamente llega a golpearme el asesino, doy punto positivo por ser un buen juego y esas cosas no joden MUCHO, pero cambienlo por favor, se ve que este juego puede tener mucho potencial si en verdad quieren pulirlo bien.
definitely worth your time playing

So I've played a decent while on this game after picking it up from the steam summer sale. In my honest opinion, just don't bother wasting your money on this game. Dbd has the potential to be good but its ruined by extreme unbalancing in favor of survivors, annoyingly long queue times for killers, a shop system with everything being overpriced af, and tons of content locked behind paywalls. Don't buy this game if you aren't prepared to spend near or over 100 dollars in dlc killers and survivors, spend massive amounts of time grinding to get good enough perks and add ons to be viable, sit on obscenely long match queue times, and after all that rage about how unbalanced the game is when survivors get all 5 gens done in 3 min and you haven't even hooked a single survivor. 

Oh btw, the insane unbalance of this game affects dlc too. Theres only a couple killers which are actually viable so even if you unlock all of them have fun playing maybe 3-5 every time.

Muito bom jogo fantÃ¡stico

Really exciting game. It's fun to make trouble as a killer, to work as a survivor in a team, or just play with / against your friends. A game that is still not boring after hundreds of hours and what is always up to date with regular updates, even if very few of the community in the head are still 10 makes it incredibly much fun.

This is possibly the only game where it's better to be part of the fandom than actually play the game.

Cons:
The players are as toxic as toxic can get. More often than not do I find myself sympathetic to the killer. That is not a good sign.
It takes forever to find a match if you want to play as killer.
Unbalanced gameplay.
Only one gamemode: 1 Killer vs 4 Survivors.
Takes forever to level up.
Awkward controls.
Almost always very low ping, even for host.
Even survivor to survivor interactions are toxic.
Cosmetics can only really be obtained through microtransactions.
Microtransactions.
Cannot pick maps.
Too many DLCs.
No real incentive to keep playing since you can't unlock characters or cosmetics, only buy them.
Killers all get one attack and a spacial. Specials range from slightly useful to downright useless.
Never truly feel satisfied, only very stressed.
Survivors feel more like annoying flies you're trying to swat than actual helpless people looking to escape.
Playing as a survivor is unsatisfying, which is usually why its easier to get a match as a survivor.
Killers never feel like an actual threat and playing as a killer just feels... artificial and bland.
Maps get either boring, confusing or both.
More stressful than enjoyable.
Survivors barely change physically, almost all look like clones.
Powerups are onetime and either worthless or overpowered.
No single player or bots. Once the game dies, it's not coming back.
Developers have an EA mentality of marketing.

But there are some good things, but none are really about gameplay.

Pros:
Killers are very unique and have amazing backstories.
Cosmetics, despite being pay to obtain, are impressive.
Killers make for excellent drawing and story material.
Fandom is more civilized than the community (that's telling)

All in all, the game has potential and the Killers are what bring color and life to the game (not just red). The gaming community is as toxic as Chernobyl but since the game is so bland and frustrating, just join the fandom and don't get the game.

This game is fantastic, however it's hard to review honestly. The amount of killers and survivors with perks and add ons makes it the most diverse horror game i've played. There are so many different styles to play! You can sneak around the map slowly avoiding the killer or you can just go as aggressive as you can and distract the killer while everyone else completes the objectives. It is an experience that you HAVE to at least try. Getting to the game though is sometimes the hard part. When playing as a survivor finding a game is never too bad. When you play killer however, expect to wait quite a bit longer for a game (because there is only one killer per game) BUT it's worth the wait because in my opinion playing killer is the most fun part of the game! It has a very unique level up system and there is a prestige mechanic so you never run out of items and can try all the characters if you wanted too. Overall this game is awesome, but due to some minor bugs and the lack of more game modes it can get stale for people who aren't fully into it. Still, i highly recommend it to any fan of horror!

Ich spiele das Spiel nun seit mehreren Jahren, jedoch rate ich davon ab. Das Spiel selbst ist gut und es wird immer dran gearbeitet was gut ist.
Doch wie so oft, versaut nur allein die Community einem den kompletten SpaÃŸ.
Man versucht fair und gerecht zu spielen, doch das wird gnadenlos ausgenutzt. Am Ende des Matches gibt es kein "gg", sondern lediglich "ez", "noob","idiot" usw.
Jeder denkt nur an sich und seinen eigenen Vorteil, alle vergessen, dass man selbst solche Gegner nicht haben mÃ¶chte.
Falls sich das Ã¼berhaupt jemand durchliest und sich entscheidet das Spiel zu kaufen, macht folgendes was ich jetzt auch machen werden.
Ich bin kein fairer Killer mehr, sondern campe und tunnel andere was das Zeug hÃ¤lt. Ich lasse kein swf mehr zu. Lasst euch von dem Gelabber nach dem Match nicht beirren.

Das Beste wÃ¤re wenn man als Killer die Lobby mit gewissen Einstellungen stellen kÃ¶nnte. Keine swf, keine Addon's, keine Perks, keine Opfergaben. Wenn es so etwas gÃ¤be, dann wÃ¼rde es kaum noch swf geben.

Pretty fun game, it's "competitively casual" and quite a lot to learn before you can become a high level survivor or killer. The only issue with the game I've found is that people can just DC (disconnect) whenever they want and it kind of ruins the fun, happens at least 50% of the time. I'll always go back for a bit of looping fun but my love for this game is surely dying. I'll recommend it because newbies are going to love it I think at least for a while anyway.

Update: They finally put in disconnect punishments so dc's happen a lot less these days.

Game with a lot of bugs and problems. Quite trash but still fun to me.

Was a thing I played (only when inebriated) until I no longer could. I have sub minimum requirements on my current PC but was able to at least launch this thing when I first got this item.  After Plague update, Behaviour gave me the "sucks to be poor, go get a good computer" and made the game un-launchable even after several hours of research and fixes to no avail.
During my time with this game I experienced so many bugs and issues that took too long to be fixed for me to be content with.  Majority of the community/fanbase is very flavored, I would highly recommend if you suffer from hyponatremia. Matchmaking is atrocious with high ping, connection issues, and stability hiccups being just a common occurence whenever I played with my friends. Balance? Pft, non-existent but that's the core of the game so that's well developed. Gameplay is exciting if you're here for a spooky scary skeleton ambiance but felt hollow personally. I totally love games where my win condition is based upon how well I can hold down a button and occasionally press a second button OR how well I can avoid any confrontation or objectives and let my team lose while I secure a lone victory. As a killer, yeah I just suck but connection issues surely don't help.

TL;DR played the game until updates made it unlaunchable for me. Experienced a lot of issues during my time with this game mainly with connection. Personally not fun and would not recommend to people suffering from high blood pressure or high sodium. 

Really wished I used my money to wipe my ass instead of buying this game; I would've felt cleaner in the end at least

Edit: oh those 16 hrs is the time i spent trying to just launch this game. wasted time, Thank you Behaviour
